mouse-move-on-zoom.name: Zoom Towards Cursor
mouse-move-on-zoom.description: When enabled, zooming in the editor with the scroll wheel will be zoomed toward the cursor and not the center of the screen. Not currently supported on MacOS

rotate-saws-in-editor.name: Rotate Saws in Editor
rotate-saws-in-editor.description: [WINDOWS ONLY] When enabled, saws will rotate while playtesting in the editor

highlight-triggers.name: Highlight triggers
highlight-triggers.description: When enabled, activated triggers will be highlighted during playtest

show-zoom-text.name: Show Zoom Text
show-zoom-text.description: When enabled, flashes the current zoom level as text when you zoom in / out in the editor

show-percentage.name: Show Percentage
show-percentage.description: When enabled, flashes the current percentage in the position slider when you move around the editor

use-time-for-percentage.name: Use Time instead of Percentage
use-time-for-percentage.description: When enabled along with Show Percentage, shows the current level time in the editor instead of the percentage.

developer-mode.name: Developer Mode
developer-mode.description: Enables some features intended for developers

issues.info: Please post your issues on the <cy>BetterEdit GitHub repository</c>.
